CustomField.description: a list in the form ["field1","field2"...] which are fields that should additionally be queried for the table. These entries will not show up on the table but can be used by search-bar. Include namespaces if the field is part of a managed package.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: a list in the form ["field1","field2"...] which are fields that should additionally be queried for the table. These entries will not show up on the table but can be used by search-bar. Include namespaces if the field is part of a managed package.
CustomField.label: Additional Fields To Query
